Package ru.alvisid.pacs.service

Class AbstractServiceTest<T extends HasId,​S extends TypicalService<T>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • ru.alvisid.pacs.service.AbstractServiceTest<T,​S>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of the test object, must extends AbstractId.
    S - the type of the Service for objects T-type, must extends TypicalService<T>.
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbsenceReasonServiceTest, AbsenceServiceTest, ActionServiceTest, ControlPointServiceTest, DayOffServiceTest, DepartmentServiceTest, DeptScheduleServiceTest, EditServiceTest, EmployeeServiceTest, EmpScheduleServiceTest, PointActionServiceTest, PointPermitServiceTest, PositionServiceTest, VisitorServiceTest
    @ContextConfiguration({"classpath:spring/spring-app.xml","classpath:spring/spring-db.xml"})
@ActiveProfiles(resolver=ActiveDbProfilesResolver.class)
@Sql(scripts="classpath:db/populateDB_hsql.sql",
     config=@SqlConfig(encoding="UTF-8"))
public abstract class AbstractServiceTest<T extends HasId,​S extends TypicalService<T>>
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract class which contains common functional and fields for all ServiceTest classes.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Glushkov Evgeniy
    See Also:
    TypicalService, AbstractTestData

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      protected void cleanCacheByAlias​(java.lang.String cacheAlias)
      Cleans e-cache by the specified alias.
      void create()
      Checks a matching the actual created value from DB to the expected created value from testData: add a new object to the DB; checks matching the actual list of all objects to the expected list of all objects after creating from testData.
      void createOldObject()
      Checks the IllegalArgumentException and exception's message when old (id is not null) create trying.
      void delete()
      Checks deletion object from DB by the specified id: deletes object by specified id; checks matching the actual list of all objects to the expected list of all objects after deletion from testData.
      void deleteNotFound()
      Checks the NotFoundException when there are no deleted object's id in the DB.
      void get()
      Checks matching the actual gotten value from DB to the expected gotten value from testData.
      void getAll()
      Checks the actual gotten list of the all objects from DB to the expected gotten list of the all objects from testData.
      void getNotFound()
      Checks the NotFoundException when there are no object's id to getting in the DB.

      Sets the specified Service to the service field.

      Checks a matching the actual updated value from DB to the expected updated value from testData: update an exiting object in the DB; checks matching the actual list of all objects to the expected list of all objects from testData.
      void updateNotFound()
      Checks the NotFoundException when there are no updated object's id in the DB.
